item.content:
![[tech.png]]

Welcome to My Blog 🎉

Hi, I’m Aditya Rawat, a tech enthusiast and developer passionate about sharing knowledge. This is my personal space where I write about technology, programming, and projects that inspire me.

🔥 Latest Posts

Stay updated with my latest thoughts and projects:

  • Getting Started with Spring Boot
  • Exploring Smart Devices with Arduino
  • Configuring Hugo for Blogs

🌟 Featured Projects

Here are some of the projects I’m proud of:

  • Electrolok Store: A file upload/download feature built with Spring Boot. Learn More
  • Smart Blind Stick: A device designed for visually and hearing-impaired individuals. Read Project

👨‍💻 About Me

I’m a developer with expertise in:

  • Java and Spring Framework
  • Building backend systems
  • Creating innovative solutions for real-world problems

When I’m not coding, I enjoy exploring new tech and working on open-source projects.

📬 Get in Touch

I’d love to connect with you! Here’s where you can find me:

  • GitHub: Its-Rawat
  • Twitter: @Its_Rawat
  • Email: aditya.rawat@example.com

Feel free to explore, read, and connect. Thanks for stopping by!
